title: What will make people watch my video to the full length? - Quora

response.answer_text: You can do several things for making people to watch your video not fully, but for longer time. Don’t bore people with not necceseary tips/sections.Always tell viewers at first what your video is going to cover and what viewers will learn at the end of it.Always keep viewers in dependence. So they will wait until the end for knowing what will happen or what you will tell them at the end of your video.Record your video in high quality.Pay attention to the sound.And give the best content and advise that you might have.After doing the mentioned tips, anyway you can’t keep your viewers to watch your video till the end. But you can make them to stay longer with your video.

Never keep a video to long. Key with getting your video seen is to keep the content relevant and directly to the point. You don't state the type of Video so with that and being my expertise is with more or less marketing videos…content, relevance, focus on the subject you are wanting viewed is extremely important. Laurie Bullard
